feed.title: Security Advisory for .NET packages hosted at the NuGet Gallery
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for .NET packages hosted at the NuGet Gallery on GitHub

entry.title: [Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.WebApiCompatShim] Moderate severity vulnerability that affects Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc and Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Core
entry.content:
Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0, 3.5, 3.5.1, 4.5.2, 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2 and 4.7 allow an attacker to bypass Enhanced Security Usage taggings when they present a certificate that is invalid for a specific use, aka ".NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability."

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-0248
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ch6p-4jcm-h8vh
  • https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2017-0248
  • https://github.com/aspnet/Announcements/issues/239
